problem:
Consider a piecewise function $g(x)$ defined as follows:

$$
g(x) = 
\begin{cases} 
4x - 5 & \text{if } x < 2, \\
\frac{1}{2-x} & \text{if } x \geq 2.
\end{cases}
$$

 What is the value of $g(g(10))$?
solution: Firstly we have $g(10) = \frac{1}{2 - 10} = \frac{-1}{8}$. Then we have $g(g(10)) = g(\frac{-1}{8}) = \boxed{\frac{-11}{2}}$
